key.name: unfold-key
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to unfold the cube.

key.name: mipmap
key.description: Generate mipmaps for higher quality scaling.

key.name: multioutput-mode
key.description: Select how the cube is displayed, if multiple output devices are used. (0 = Automatic, 1 = Multiple cubes, 2 = One big cube)

key.name: in
key.description: Place the camera inside the cube.

key.name: acceleration
key.description: The acceleration of folding and unfolding. (1.0 - 20.0)

key.name: speed
key.description: The speed of folding and unfolding. (0.1 - 50.0)

key.name: timestep
key.description: The timestep of folding and unfolding. (0.1 - 50.0)

key.name: top-color
key.description: Color and opacity of top face of the cube.

key.name: bottom-color
key.description: Color and opacity of bottom face of the cube.

key.name: skydome-image
key.description: Image to use as texture for the skydome.

key.name: skydome-animated
key.description: Animate the skydome when rotating the cube.

key.name: skydome-gradient-start-color
key.description: Color and opacity to use for the top color-stop of the skydome-fallback gradient.

key.name: skydome-gradient-end-color
key.description: Color and opacity to use for the bottom color-stop of the skydome-fallback gradient.

key.name: active-opacity
key.description: Opacity of the desktop during cube rotation (in percent). (0.0 - 100.0)

key.name: inactive-opacity
key.description: Opacity of the desktop when not rotating the cube (in percent). (0.0 - 100.0)

key.name: transparent-manual-only
key.description: Initiates cube transparency only, if the rotation is mouse driven.
